segment.source: How to Manage Application Licenses in the Server Management Console
segment.target: How to Manage Application Licenses in the Server Management Console

segment.source: How to Manage Application Licenses in the Server Management Console
segment.target: How to Manage Application Licenses in the Server Management Console

segment.source: How to Manage Application Licenses in the Server Management Console
segment.target: How to Manage Application Licenses in the Server Management Console

segment.source: The Application Virtualization Server Management Console is the interface you use to manage the Application Virtualization platform.
segment.target: The Application Virtualization Server Management Console is the interface you use to manage the Application Virtualization platform.

segment.source: From it, you can add, remove, configure, and control application license groups.
segment.target: From it, you can add, remove, configure, and control application license groups.

segment.source: Important
segment.target: Important

segment.source: If the App-V client Application Source Root (ASR) setting is configured to use any type of streaming source other than the Management Server, for example a Streaming Server, an IIS server, or a File server, then the Management Server is unable to enforce its licensing policy.
segment.target: If the App-V client Application Source Root (ASR) setting is configured to use any type of streaming source other than the Management Server, for example a Streaming Server, an IIS server, or a File server, then the Management Server is unable to enforce its licensing policy.

segment.source: In This Section
segment.target: In This Section

segment.source: How to Create an Application License Group
segment.target: How to Create an Application License Group

segment.source: Provides a procedure for creating a new application in a license group.
segment.target: Provides a procedure for creating a new application in a license group.

segment.target: How to Associate an Application with a License Group

segment.source: Provides a procedure for adding an application to a license group.
segment.target: Provides a procedure for adding an application to a license group.

segment.target: How to Remove an Application from a License Group

segment.target: Provides a procedure for removing an application from a license group.

segment.source: How to Remove an Application License Group
segment.target: How to Remove an Application License Group

segment.source: This section includes the steps necessary to delete an application license group.
segment.target: This section includes the steps necessary to delete an application license group.

segment.source: How to Set Up an Unlimited License Group
segment.target: How to Set Up an Unlimited License Group

segment.source: Provides a procedure for creating a new unlimited license group, allowing an unlimited number of users to access the applications in the group.
segment.target: Provides a procedure for creating a new unlimited license group, allowing an unlimited number of users to access the applications in the group.

segment.source: How to Set Up a Concurrent License Group
segment.target: How to Set Up a Concurrent License Group

segment.source: Provides a procedure for creating a new concurrent license group, allowing a specific number of concurrent users to access the applications in the group.
segment.target: Provides a procedure for creating a new concurrent license group, allowing a specific number of concurrent users to access the applications in the group.

segment.source: How to Set Up a Named License Group
segment.target: How to Set Up a Named License Group

segment.source: Provides a procedure for creating a new unlimited license group, allowing specific users to access the applications in the group.
segment.target: Provides a procedure for creating a new unlimited license group, allowing specific users to access the applications in the group.
